question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the 23rd-floor balcony. What is your next move, given the target location for your next move?  
choose:  
A. I rise.  
B. I rotate the camera downward.  
C. I fly forward.  
D. I turn left.  
E. I turn right.  
F. I rotate the camera upward.  
G. I descend.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: A; Reason: To navigate to the 23rd-floor balcony, the agent needs to rise vertically since the current perspective is from a lower position relative to the building. Rising will bring the agent closer to the target floor.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 2)]
Option: A
Reason: From the initial position (0-2s), the camera is looking at the surrounding buildings. To reach the 23rd-floor balcony, the agent needs to move upwards. Therefore, the next move is to rise.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: A; Reason: To navigate to the 23rd-floor balcony, the agent needs to rise vertically since the current perspective is from a lower position relative to the building. Rising will bring the agent closer to the target floor.
